from pyspark.sql import functions as F

cases_map_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/config/Cases/Cases.csv"

# folder that contains pivoted CSV(s)
involv_folder = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/LLAttr/Case_Involvement_95501/"

person_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/Contacts_Person.csv"
org_path    = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/Contacts_Organisation.csv"

out_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/CaseInvolvement/CaseInvolvement_Contacts.csv"

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

# ID = CaseNodeId (legacy case id)
case_col    = "ID"
contact_col = "20"   # ContactID
type_col    = "3"    # Type Of Involvement
start_col   = "4"    # Involvement Start Date
end_col     = "16"   # Involvement End Date
comm_col    = "17"   # Communication Preference
extref_col  = "18"   # External Reference Number
details_col = "19"   # Contact Details

involv = (involv_raw
    .withColumn("legacyCaseId", F.col(case_col).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.trim(F.col(contact_col).cast("string")))
    .withColumn("typeOfInvolvement", F.trim(F.col(type_col).cast("string")))
    .withColumn("involvementStartDate", F.col(start_col).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("involvementEndDate", F.col(end_col).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("communicationPreference", F.col(comm_col).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("externalReferenceNumber", F.col(extref_col).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("contactDetails", F.col(details_col).cast("string"))
)

# Filter to only mapped cases (inner join)
involv_filtered = (involv
    .join(cases_map, on="legacyCaseId", how="inner")
    .filter(F.col("legacyContactId").isNotNull())
)

print("involv_filtered rows:", involv_filtered.count())
display(involv_filtered.limit(20))

def read_csv(path: str):
    return (spark.read.format("csv")
            .option("header", "true")
            .option("multiLine", "true")
            .option("quote", "\"")
            .option("escape", "\"")
            .option("mode", "PERMISSIVE")
            .load(path))

people = (read_csv(person_path)
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.col("P_ID").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("contactSource", F.lit("person"))
    .withColumn("orgName", F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("firstName", F.trim(F.col("FirstName")))
    .withColumn("lastName",  F.trim(F.col("LastName")))
    .withColumn("email",     F.trim(F.col("Email")))
    .withColumn("telephoneNumber", F.coalesce(F.trim(F.col("TelephoneMobile")), F.trim(F.col("TelephoneOffice"))))
    .select("legacyContactId","contactSource","orgName","firstName","lastName","email","telephoneNumber")
)

orgs = (read_csv(org_path)
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.col("ID").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("contactSource", F.lit("org"))
    .withColumn("orgName", F.trim(F.col("Name")))
    .withColumn("firstName", F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("lastName",  F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("email",     F.trim(F.col("Email")))
    .withColumn("telephoneNumber", F.trim(F.col("TelephoneOffice")))
    .select("legacyContactId","contactSource","orgName","firstName","lastName","email","telephoneNumber")
)

contacts_dim = people.unionByName(orgs).dropDuplicates(["legacyContactId","contactSource"])

involv_with_contacts = (involv_filtered
    .join(contacts_dim, on="legacyContactId", how="left")
)

print("involv_with_contacts rows:", involv_with_contacts.count())
display(involv_with_contacts.limit(50))

out = (involv_with_contacts
    .select(
        "caseId",
        "legacyCaseId",
        "legacyContactId",
        "typeOfInvolvement",
        "involvementStartDate",
        "involvementEndDate",
        "communicationPreference",
        "externalReferenceNumber",
        "contactDetails",
        "contactSource",
        "orgName",
        "firstName",
        "lastName",
        "email",
        "telephoneNumber"
    )
)

print("out rows:", out.count())
display(out.limit(50))

(out.coalesce(1)
   .write.mode("overwrite")
   .option("header", "true")
   .csv(out_path)
)
print("Wrote:", out_path)
